DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety LEO 43204 Field Treatment Actinic Keratosis Face Chest Including 12-month Follow-up
DOC.criteria: Subjects 5 20 clinically typical , visible discrete AKs within treatment area sundamaged skin either full face contiguous area approximately 250 cm2 ( 40 in2 ) chest Subjects minimum 3 clinically typical , visible discrete AKs within track area 50 cm2 ( 8 in2 ) . The track area must within treatment area Location treatment area ( full face chest ) within 5 cm incompletely heal wound within 5 cm suspect BCC SCC Treatment ingenol mebutate gel treatment area within last 12 month Lesions treatment area : atypical clinical appearance ( e.g . hyperthrophic , hyperkeratotic cutaneous horn ) /or , recalcitrant disease ( e.g . respond cryotherapy two previous occasion ) History evidence skin condition trial indication would interfere evaluation trial medication ( e.g. , eczema , unstable psoriasis , xeroderma pigmentosum )
